profile.greeting: Welcome to Hacademy {{user_first_name}}! Click get started to enjoy our sample automated messaging experience.

get_started.help: What we can do to help you today?

website.cart: Check your item in cart: https://cafocc.web.app/cart

course.prompt_none: Sorry, I can't find any course for you. Please find another course or you can refer to some courses bellow.
course.prompt: These are some courses for you üòÅ

subject.prompt_none: Sorry, I can't find any subject for you

email.connected: Your facebook account is connected to user {{email}}.
email.confirm: Please check your email {{email}} to verify your account.
email.invalid: Your email is invalid. Please enter again or quit.
email.not_found: We can't find any user with email {{email}}. Please enter again or create a new one?.
email.input: Please enter your email to connect to Facebook.

chat_plugin.prompt: Thanks for visiting our store, be sure to check out all the great styles we have on the summer section.

fallback.attachment: Thanks for sending this attachment, we can connect you to an agent to review it or we can start over
